preconditions.precondition: Hub and Fault Management components are operational
Listeners for FaultManagementJobNotification and FaultManagementReportNotification are registered

mainSequence.step: Business User registers listeners (FaultManagementJobNotification, FaultManagementReportNotification) with Hub
System Operator Facility creates Fault Management Job
Fault Management Job is created and acknowledged by the System Operator Facility
Event is generated by the Fault Management Job in Hub and Business User is notified
Fault Management Job progresses to in-progress state
State change event is triggered for Fault Management Job in Hub and Business User is notified
Data is generated for the Fault Management Job
Fault Management Report is created corresponding to the Fault Management Job
Event is generated for Fault Management Report in Hub and Business User is notified
Fault Management Report progresses to in-progress state
State change event is triggered for Fault Management Report in Hub and Business User is notified
Data is collected and the state of Fault Management Report changes to completed
State change event is triggered for the completed Fault Management Report and Business User is notified
Report completion notification is sent from Fault Management Report to Fault Management Job
Event is generated for report completeness in Hub and Business User is notified
Fault Management Job reaches completed or scheduled state, resulting in various state events in Hub and notifications for Business User
Business User requests Fault Management Report from System Operator Facility
Fault Management Report is retrieved and acknowledged by the System Operator Facility
Requested Fault Management Report is sent in response to the Business User
